practice_phrases.target: I am taking time to practise
I do not want to take too much time

practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢花时间来学习英语
practice_phrases.target: I like taking time to learn English

practice_phrases.known: 你花时间说这个句子，因为你想说得很好
practice_phrases.target: you are taking time to say this sentence, because you want to say it well

practice_phrases.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答，但我想准备好
practice_phrases.target: I do not like taking too much time to answer, but I want to be ready
